Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Partners: Choose the best Azure DB for every customer scenario | PBRK232
Tags: Partners: Choose the best Azure DB for every customer scenario | PBRK232
Description:
Microsoft's database portfolio offers a range of options for your customers to achieve any goal. Come to this session to learn about the top use cases for each of our managed database products and how to pitch customers on the value of co-locating databases on Azure with other workloads including AI, analytics, or applications. Whether your customers are migrating and modernizing enterprise applications from on-premise solutions to the cloud or building AI applications, Azure has you covered.
